page.title: 14GREEN BELT (2)
page.content: and many old ones were cut down mainly because they are in the way of people using the path,or they might fall and block the brook. While we were looking at trees I noticed a Blackbird in an old HorseChestnut tree.And there were a couple of Blue Tits by the fence.We saw 2 Starlings and Claire spotted a House Martin.In the brook we saw Trout ,Sticlebacks and a Water rat just coming out of its hole. The buildings we saw were Lodge Farm School,the shops near Sandalwood road,the pet shop,the hard ware shop, the grocers and the hair dressers.The Forest gate is a public house and the Holt is a students residence.There were lots of little waterfalls all the way along our walk,about 10 if not more.
